name: BEST WESTERN PLUS Madison-Huntsville Hotel

reviews.title: Great Hotel, stayed 2 nights June 2006
reviews.text: This hotel was really good value. Pool Area was excellent, really decent size pool. Restaurant is nice, quite upscale but fine for kids. I found the staff to be really helpful and friendly. Room was fine. Other guests told me they return to this hotel frequently.

reviews.title: Great Hotel
reviews.text: Very Clean, nice lounge, great breakfast... Easy access to interstate and huntsville. I would stay here again

reviews.title: Great hotel
reviews.text: An excellent hotel with very good staff. Rate was reduced for us as we were staying on Easter sunday and only continental breakfast was available. Food in resturant excellent. Location very good for space museum. We stayed a a variety of high class hotels on our trip and did not expect a lot from this hotel and were very plesently surprised about the quality of service (and good rooms) that was much more friendly than other hotels. I fully recommend this hotel.

description: Experience true Southern Hospitality at Best Western Plus Madison - Huntsville Hotel. Our experienced staff stands ready to exceed your expectations. With the Port of Madison Cafe and meeting space, we have what you need whether travelling for business or pleasure.
